messages.content:
Your task is to translate outdated AngularJS app code to recent version of React using functional components and hooks.
Outdated application is composed of the following files:
index.html
js/main.js
js/app.js
js/directives/todoFocus.js
js/directives/todoEscape.js
js/controllers/todo.js
js/services/todoStorage.js

Your task is to request content of each file and analyze its implementation.
You should ask for files content by the json command.
Example:
{
    "command": "read-file",
    "file_path": "js/controllers/todo.js"
}

After getting and analyzing of all file's content - think thoroughly and *return only new file structure* of translated React application in a form of JSON command.
Example:
{
    "command": "file-structure",
    "file_paths": [
        "./name1.ts",
        "./name2.tsx",
        "...",
    ]
}
 
After you return the file structure of the updated application, 
I will request you for each file by the file_path in the list and you should use following command to give me converted file.

Apply these instructions for translated application:
    - Use the following libraries: TypeScript, Redux Toolkit with createSlice, and nanoid.
    - Provide configuration of the store and provider if needed.
    - Split the code into separate components.
    - Optimize the code where possible.
    - The converted code should not contain any TODOs.
    - Return the translated code as markdown code snippets.
    - Simply return the codebase without additional comments or explanations on how to convert it.


Example:
{
    "command": "write-file",
    "file_path": "path to file"
    "content": "enscated converted code is here"
}

Do not add any comments in generated code and follow the instructions precisely. Once you finish the whole task, please issue the "end" command.
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "index.html"}

todos

{{remainingCount}}
  • All
  • Active
  • Completed

Double-click to edit a todo

Credits: Christoph Burgdorf, Eric Bidelman, Jacob Mumm, Igor Minar and Pascal Hartig

Part of TodoMVC
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/main.js"}
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/app.js"}
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/directives/todoFocus.js"}
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/directives/todoEscape.js"}
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/controllers/todo.js"}
{"command": "read-file", "file_path": "js/services/todoStorage.js"}

{"command": "file-structure", "file_paths": ["public/index.html", "src/App.tsx", "src/components/TodoForm.tsx", "src/components/TodoList.tsx", "src/components/TodoItem.tsx", "src/components/Footer.tsx", "src/store/todoSlice.ts", "src/store/store.ts", "src/hooks/useTodoStorage.ts", "src/hooks/useEscapeKey.ts", "src/hooks/useFocus.ts", "src/styles/base.css", "src/styles/index.css"]}
Give me converted code of src/styles/index.css
Give me converted code of src/styles/base.css
Give me converted code of src/hooks/useFocus.ts
Give me converted code of src/hooks/useEscapeKey.ts
Give me converted code of src/hooks/useTodoStorage.ts
Give me converted code of src/store/store.ts
Give me converted code of src/store/todoSlice.ts
Give me converted code of src/components/Footer.tsx
Give me converted code of src/components/TodoItem.tsx
Give me converted code of src/components/TodoList.tsx
Give me converted code of src/components/TodoForm.tsx
Give me converted code of src/App.tsx
Give me converted code of public/index.html

{"command": "write-file", "file_path": "public/index.html", "content": " React TypeScript TodoMVC
"}
